input_text:
Job Title: Business Development Representative (Summer Intern)

Location: Boston, MA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
Cheetah Capital is a Boston based startup providing businesses with fast alternative funding solutions. We are actively seeking a resourceful and determined Business Development Intern for the Summer term. This role will contribute significantly towards molding our marketing approach and bolstering our sales and partnership network. The selected intern will closely collaborate with our founders on high-stakes projects, gaining substantial experience and knowledge.
While we primarily target undergraduate students with a focus on business studies, we warmly welcome applications from exceptionally talented undergraduates from other disciplines.
Compensation: $3,000 - $7,500 per month.
Key Responsibilities:Conceiving and implementing business strategies to foster growth for our startupCarrying out comprehensive industry and market researchGenerating leads and coordinating outreach activities for prospective customers and partnershipsEstablishing and managing a pipeline of potential clientsParticipating in the formulation and execution of sales and marketing initiativesAssisting the team in creating compelling sales proposals and presentations
Ideal Candidate:Exhibits humility, drive for impact, and enthusiasm for the dynamic startup culture, showcasing adaptability to take on varied roles during the internshipShows commitment to data-driven research, willing to experiment and possesses problem-solving abilities to address intricate, open-ended challengesComfortable with outbound sales activities, including proficiency in using CRMs, making cold calls/emails, etc.Exceptional communicator and adept at using Microsoft Excel/Google Sheets


The ideal candidate will:Be humble, impact driven, and passionate about startup work, showing the flexibility to take on different roles throughout the internshipShow a commitment to data-driven research and experimentation with the problem-solving skills to tackle messy open-ended questionsBe comfortable with outbound sales, including working in CRMs, cold calls/emails, etcBe an excellent communicator and strong with Microsoft Excel/Google Sheets
At Cheetah Capital we are committed to providing an environment of mutual respect where equal employment opportunities are available to all applicants and teammates without regard to race, color, religion, sex, pregnancy (including childbirth, lactation and related medical conditions), national origin, age, physical and mental disability, marital status, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, genetic information (including characteristics and testing), military and veteran status, and any other characteristic protected by applicable law. Cheetah Capital believes that diversity and inclusion among our teammates is critical to our success as a global company, and we seek to recruit, develop and retain the most talented people from a diverse candidate pool.

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: Business Development Representative (Summer Intern)
output_json.summary: Cheetah Capital seeks a Business Development Intern for the Summer term.
job_responsibilities: carrying out industry and market research
participating in sales and marketing initiatives
assisting in creating sales proposals and presentations
output_json.company_information: Cheetah Capital is a Boston-based startup providing businesses with fast alternative funding solutions.
output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: Cheetah Capital is committed to providing an environment of mutual respect where equal employment opportunities are available to all applicants and teammates without regard to various protected characteristics.
